This is to load the required packages
```{r}
# to load required packages
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(scales)

# to load and read data
homicides <- read_csv("data/homicide-data.csv")

# to combine city and state city into a single 'city_name' column
homicides <- homicides %>% 
  unite(col= city_name, city, state, sep=", ") 

# to filter data for Baltimore, MD
balt_homicides <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore, MD")

```
